body.p: There are several Indictments in this Court against our Moses Baer for keeping tipling Houses & selling & liquor to slaves.

Baer is a clean little Dutch boy and has done all he could to help on the Union cause during our troubles and is poor & really keeps an orderly little family given we have several such in our village & I have no hesitation in saying he has violated

the law less than any of them. They all escaped the Grand Jury but for some reason Bear was indicted in several cases. I think there is no disposition on the fact of the Commonwealth here to see him fined and I cheerfully ^recommend^ him as worthy of the clemency of your Excellency.
